localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: We've been on a mission to make work better. Now, we're making it safer too.â¤ï¸ With vaccination policy management, health alerts & visitor management, you can take a proactive approach to office safety, while preparing for developing guidelines & regulations.
nodes.title: Office Health & Safety by Tactic - Create a safe & healthy workplace for employee collaboration
nodes.author: Chris Barcus

nodes.excerpt: Alfread is a new kind of a read later app. It helps you to actually read saved articles. Or skip them. No pressure. Alfread helps you rediscover your love for reading what you've saved. One article at a time.
nodes.title: Alfread - Actually read articles saved for later
nodes.author: Fedor Shkliarau

nodes.excerpt: PassThru allows you to store and manage all your tickets, vouchers and reservations safely in one place. Regardless of the ticket provider; it works with every system.
nodes.title: PassThru - A ticket storing app based on email ğŸŸ
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: Showping is the power of word of mouth in your pocket. Showping is a unique app where you can share your Wish and Bought list with friends. It's a place where people can read reviews from someone they trust and do shopping together through screen sharing.
nodes.title: Showping - Show & shop with friends, shopping advice social network
nodes.author: Natallia Rayinchick

nodes.excerpt: Daily affirmations help shift your mindset to positive thinking. Get a personalized plan for 28 days that will help you become grateful, inspired, content, and just happier by verbally affirming your dreams and ambitions!
nodes.title: Able: 28-Day Affirmation Plan - Personalized daily positive affirmations
nodes.author: Aleksandr Lanin

nodes.excerpt: Explore your top songs, artists, and podcasts from a year that was far from normal.
nodes.title: 2021 Wrapped by Spotify - Relive all the music you discovered and loved in 2021.
nodes.author: BjÃ¶rn Antonissen

nodes.excerpt: BoldVoice helps non-native English speakers communicate clearly and confidently in English. The app gives you video lessons from Hollywood accent coaches and instant feedback on your pronunciation from speech AI. Get it on iOS & Android!
nodes.title: BoldVoice 2.0 - Accent coaching app for non-native English speakers
nodes.author: Anada Lakra

nodes.excerpt: Do you miss being able to use the whiteboard in the new hybrid world? We too, that is why we made Grapic. Share your real whiteboard or notebook directly into your Zoom meeting, FigJam session, or any browser, using just your iPhone.
nodes.title: Grapic - Use your real whiteboard and notebook in hybrid meetings
nodes.author: Vikas Reddy

nodes.excerpt: Counting down the days to Christmas has never been more exciting with Indie App Santa advent calendar! Get ready for 24 days of surprise: 24 doors to open and as much great applications from indie developers to discover with exciting discounts!
nodes.title: Indie App Santa 2021 - Advent Calendar from indie iOS developers!
nodes.author: FranÃ§ois Boulais

nodes.excerpt: We know how stressful the life of a maker can be. It's super important to take care of your well-being. But how? We've built an app that inspires people to better themselves, and the world, daily through Creator-led challenges. Check it out now!
nodes.title: Alms - A well-being social app focused on IRL actions
nodes.author: Alexander Nevedovsky

nodes.excerpt: GoDog is an app with a set of lessons for dogs and their owners, created with the support of experienced dog trainers. A dog training and walking plan, a health diary, and a walking tracker in the app help you keep your pet well-behaved, healthy, and happy.
nodes.title: GoDog - Raise a well-behaved dog and build a stronger bond with it.
nodes.author: Volha Basak

nodes.excerpt: WidgetGrid is a new way to turn Google Spreadsheets into data-driven widgets on the home screen. You can start from templates to create widgets. You can edit your data in spreadsheets and customize the design of all kinds of widgets in WidgetGrid.
nodes.title: WidgetGrid - No-code platform for iOS widgets
nodes.author: Bill Ng

nodes.excerpt: Web3 enables shared ownership and rewarding actual contributions. On Phaver you help others by sharing your best recommendations and get rewarded with tokens and DAO ownership. Join communities around your interests and collect the best things together.
nodes.title: Phaver - Decentralized recommendation app with crypto rewards
nodes.author: Johannes Frank

nodes.excerpt: Pancea makes chronic pain relief easily accessible and affordable. The app develops customized exercise and stress management routines. User's experienced a 80% reduction of pain levels by 12 weeks without booking 1 appointment. FREE registration code:easepain
nodes.title: Pancea - Chronic pain relief mobile application
nodes.author: Ashley Hunt

nodes.excerpt: Hi guys! I have made a tool to track your sex life:Aphroditeï¼Now you can get it for free in the AppStore~ You can record your sex life in detail, Aphrodite can also be used to record masturbation for those who do not have a sexual partner.
nodes.title: Aphrodite Sex Tracker - Calendar of your sexual Life

nodes.excerpt: Momint allows artists to post their work as NFTs, sell them, and receive tips. This enables smaller artists to break into the NFT space, experiment with blockchain technology for the first time and build a following.
nodes.title: Momint  - The NFT Marketplace for when the bubble bursts
nodes.author: Steph

nodes.excerpt: Dailyx allows you to convert your photos into life-capturing movies. Share results to Instagram, Facebook, TikTok. With a range of additional camera features, you can take consistent and perfectly aligned photos to generate perfect timelapse for your own story
nodes.title: Dailyx - Convert your photos into life-capturing movies
nodes.author: Dzionis Brek

nodes.excerpt: Earn yield and trade cryptocurrencies. Deposit your USD or crypto to earn compounding returns. Earn rewards in USDT, USDC, BTC and more. Withdraw any time directly to USD. No deposit, withdrawal, spread or transfer fees. $40 USDC earning bonus for new users.

nodes.excerpt: HumanVoice is made for content creators who want the absolute best quality when it comes to text to human like speech. We think that your audience will love it. It also features a Safari Extension so you can listen to articles right from your Safari browser.
nodes.title: HumanVoice - Text to voiceover for content creators

nodes.excerpt: iOS does not support browser notifications today, but Now Push Notify makes this possible. Send push notifications to your iOS visitors through the Now Push app. Compliment your email marketing and reach your users on their terms, and on their phones!

nodes.excerpt: Browse the latest Twitter Spaces happening right now and view Spaces coming up in the next 2 weeks. Normally it's hard to find Twitter Spaces other than those from people you follow. SpaceTable makes it easy to discover Spaces you would never have found.

nodes.title: Forkist - Food focused social network to eat, connect, and share

nodes.excerpt: Mindpass makes passwords simple, easy, and secure - all through the power of the Mindpass 3D environment. No more complex master key memorization. No more passwords, ever! Simply select four objects in the secure Mindpass environment and weâ€™ll do the rest!

nodes.title: Mojilink - Add links to any Instagram or TikTok post

nodes.excerpt: Interakt enables small & medium businesses to manage customer interactions, facilitate sales and customer support on WhatsApp. Powered by official WhatsApp Business APIs, Interakt provides a shared Inbox, campaign manager, Shopify integration & more.

nodes.title: Plans - The ultimate social event planner app for real-life meetups!
nodes.author: Adnan Kharuf

nodes.excerpt: Form new habits, follow existing ones. Find time for them in your tight schedule. Log emotions, feelings and thoughts. Track progress and don't forget your everyday duties and deadlines. We build tee to make your dai- ly routine something unique and exciting!
nodes.title: Next - Daily routine & goals planner
nodes.author: Tomasz K.

nodes.excerpt: Structured is a visual day planner, which combines calendars and to-do lists into an easy-to-use interface. You can schedule tasks with a few taps, see their progress throughout the day and tick them off once you are done.
nodes.title: Structured 2.0 - A simple and beautifully visual day planner for iOS
nodes.author: Leo Mehlig

nodes.excerpt: LinkBin is an app for iOS, iPadOS and macOS that allows temporary storage of links. Saving links is dead simple and you can automate everything with Apple's Shortcuts app.
nodes.title: LinkBin - Save links for later
nodes.author: David Haydl

nodes.excerpt: RecSpot is a social app that makes sharing what you love with your friends easy and fun. RecSpot is a new, go-to destination for exchanging, discovering, and watching your favorite movies and television shows. All recommended by people you know and trust.
nodes.title: RecSpot - Recommendations powered by people you know and trust
nodes.author: Ian OBrien

nodes.excerpt: We want to substantially alleviate the student debt crisis within the US, specifically by targeting those who are entering college and equipping them with the knowledge needed to make a wise and financially responsible decision for their higher education.
nodes.title: Scholarcash! - A SaaS, social, and mobile app platform for scholarships
nodes.author: Alessandro De La Torre

nodes.excerpt: Track calories and macronutrients with a flexible range. Personalize insights to stay on top of blood sugar, weight loss, workouts, and more. Fuel adapts to you. Create long-term habits and hit goals.
nodes.title: Fuel - Flexible calorie & nutrient tracking

nodes.excerpt: Kaleidoscope is the perfect productivity enhancement for anyone working with lots of files, such as software developers of any kind. Spot the differences in text and image files, or even folders full of files. Review changes in seconds.

nodes.excerpt: KADO helps you to better connect with your clients, exchange business cards, manage contacts, record notes and interactions on prospects to stay on top of your game. Powerful integrations & intuitive UI will help you better manage and convert your prospects

nodes.title: MyRide901 - Capture, manage and share your vehicles' service history
